document_data.mainbody:
ord Aulauthar Orbryn was a mage of Cormanthyr working in the 3 century DR.
In  he helped raise the mythal of Myth Drannor he attempted to contribute one of the minor powers of the effect. Unfortunately, he became the first victim of Uldreiyn Starym, who slew him and attempted to hide in the place where his consciousness was and thus he was unable to add powers to it.
